title: Black client screen in champ select
body: Been facing issues where parts of my client screen will go black during champ select. Roughly 20 minutes ago this happened and I attempted to resize my screen, resulting in a total blackout and being unable to lock in champ selection, resulting in a "loss" for me (it was ranked). And word on this issue?

replies.body:
Typically a black screen during champ select is caused by a connection issue. This is because when your client isn't able to establish a proper connection to the champion select instance, it will just appear black. I recommend you work through our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to resolve this.

Let me know if those steps work for you.
